---
id: get-latest-state-root
title: "Get latest state root"
description: "Retrieves the latest state root from the Aleo blockchain.  The state root is the merkle root of all previous block hashes."
sidebar_label: "Get latest state root"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: welcome/documentation/apis/v2/provable-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get latest state root"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/blocks/latest/stateRoot"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the latest state root from the Aleo blockchain.  The state root is the merkle root of all previous block hashes.


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
